name: ModifyAlarm
description: This API modifies an alarm from the from_time to to_time.

parameters.name: fom_time
parameters.description: The time for alarm which changed from. Format: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss'

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: The time for alarm which changed to. Format: YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss'

example.output: The alarm set on 2023-03-16 07:00:00 has been successfully modified to 2023-03-16 09:00:00.
